name: Punch-a-Nazi 3000
description:
A game about punching nazis. Made for the Anti-fascist game jam.

Controls
Left/right: move/select fist
Space: punch/select fist

Description
A custom controller was built as part of the jam session (see images), but the game can be played using arrow keys for moving and space for punching. The fist screen might look weird on different screen resolutions because I'm lazy, but just press space and you will get to the actual game.

The game is built on PhaserJS. My code is pretty horrible, so there will most likely be bugs. The physical controller was built using particle board and a lot of hot glue, using a Makey Makey to connect everything.
